org.apache.flex.abc.semantics

Class ControlFlowGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.abc.semantics.ControlFlowGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFlowgraph

    public class ControlFlowGraph
extends Object
implements IFlowgraph
    A ControlFlowGraph represents the flow of control through a sequence of instructions. The instructions are organized into a set of Blocks -- sequences of instructions where normal control flow proceeds linearly from one instruction to the next -- and a set of edges, representing the discontinuous transfer of control points.

      • blocksInControlFlowOrder

        public Iterable<IBasicBlock> blocksInControlFlowOrder()
        Get an iterator that will iterate over the blocks in the graph. in depth-first preorder. This will traverse each edge in the graph once, but may return the same block multiple times if multiple edges lead to it.
        Specified by:
        blocksInControlFlowOrder in interface IFlowgraph
